SEARCH
Module com.goattechnologies.pos
Package com.goattechnologies.pos

Class StatisticsController

java.lang.Object
com.goattechnologies.pos.StatisticsController
public class StatisticsController extends Object
This class serves as the controller for the statistics view in a Point of Sale (POS) application. It manages the display of a table of ingredients that are low on stock and provides functionality for navigating to the sales, excess, restock, popularity, and what sells reports views. It also provides functionality for navigating back to the manager view.
